scenario_text.value:
Don’t spread out TOO far, everyone! Stay
where I can SEE you!

(Shuuji’s doing his best to keep us all
together. Still...)
Get back here, Minoru! Listen to what I say!

Sir, yes, sir! I do apologize, Your
Blustership.

(I get the feeling he’s not making much
headway.)

This is what I mean by everyone doing what
they want... Saki and Ryo are no different.

That’s what causes trouble like this! We have
rules for a reason, people...
NO ONE wander off on their own. GOT IT?!
